hours_text:
# Visitor Information

### Address

Loch Haven Cultural Park  
900 E. Princeton Street  
Orlando, Florida 32803

tel: 407.246.4278

### Hours

Tuesday – Saturday 10:30 a.m. – 4:30 p.m.  
Sunday 12 – 4:30 p.m.  
Closed Mondays

#### Holiday Schedule

Closed Thanksgiving (Thursday, November 25)

Closed Christmas Day (Saturday, December 25)

Closed New Year’s Day (Saturday, January 1, 2022)

Sculpture Garden is always open to the public.

### Admission

Pricing  
Adults - $8.00  
Seniors - $5.00  
Educators and Students (with valid ID) - $3.00  
Children ages 6-17 - $3.00  
Children under age 6: FREE  
Active, retired military, veterans and their families with valid ID: FREE

[Buy Tickets](https://mennello-museum-of-american-art.square.site/)

### Docent Tours

With advance notice, a guided tour of the museum with a docent or educator can be arranged to enhance your art experience. Tours are typically conducted Tuesday – Friday from 11 a.m. – 3 p.m., and on Sunday from 1 – 3:00 p.m. Tours are 45 – 55 minutes in length for adults, and 30 – 40 minutes for children. Please contact the museum at least one week in advance to allow time to make the arrangements.

Ask about our Virtual Tours! 

###### Blue Star Museum Program

The Mennello Museum of American Art is proud to be one of more than 2,000 museums to participate in the [Blue Star Museum program](https://www.arts.gov/initiatives/blue-star-museums). We offer free admission to all active, retired military personnel, veterans and...
